result.pre: Looking back on the medications used to fight SARS-CoV, initially
result.post: was recognized as a widely active antiviral drug that

result.pre: little use to SARS patients. The in vitro activities of
result.post: on the replication of SARS-CoV are highly variable, depending

result.pre: assays. Many SARS patients were treated with a combination of
result.post: and corticosteroids, given such poor prognosis linked to drug

result.pre: previous anti-SARS studies and computer simulations, older drugs, like cinnamon
result.post: and cyclosporin A (CsA), could be effective against 2019-nCoV.
